title: One Piece Chapter 1139 Release Date, Time & Where To Read the Manga
description: The release date and time for One Piece Chapter 1139 have finally been announced, and fans are eager to know where to read the manga online. The upcoming chapter promises to propel the thrilling story forward, continuing the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his crew as they pursue the legendary treasure. So, without wasting […] The post One Piece Chapter 1139 Release Date, Time & Where To Read the Manga appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Curious about the release date and time of Chapter 1139 of One Piece as well as where to read the manga? Here are all the details.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The release date and time for One Piece Chapter 1139 have finally been announced, and fans are eager to know where to read the manga online. The upcoming chapter promises to propel the thrilling story forward, continuing the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his crew as they pursue the legendary treasure. So, without wasting any time, let’s dive into all the essential details regarding the release of One Piece Chapter 1139 and how to access it online. When is the One Piece Chapter 1139 release date and time? One Piece Chapter 1139 is scheduled to premiere officially on Sunday, February 9, 2025, at 7 AM PT in the U.S. The latest chapter of the manga is on the way, and there will be no break next week. This ensures that the exciting story continues uninterrupted. With no delays affecting the current chapters, fans can dive into the unfolding saga without interruptions. To stay updated, check out the release times in local time zones in the U.S. and UK below: 7 AM PT 9 AM CT 10 AM ET On the other hand, for those in Japan, the chapter will be available a day later, on Monday, February 10, 2025, at 12 AM JST. Where to read the One Piece Manga with Chapter 1139? One Piece Chapter 1139 will be available for reading on platforms like Viz Media, Shonen Jump+, and Shueisha’s MANGA Plus. To read Chapter 1139, a standard subscription to the Shueisha MANGA Plus platform is necessary. This provides access to over 6,000 chapters and is available for only $1.99 per month. For those seeking more content, a premium membership is also offered at $4.99 per month, granting access to over 15,000 chapters. Additionally, new users on the MANGA Plus website can also take advantage of a complimentary first month. The final three chapters, 1136, 1137, and 1138, will also be accessible to readers at no cost through Viz Media. However, to gain full access to the entire One Piece manga series, a monthly subscription priced at $2.99 is required. Meanwhile, Shonen Jump+ is a digital manga publication and mobile application managed by Shueisha, providing users with access to a diverse range of manga series, which encompasses both original works and digital adaptations of well-known manga titles. Created by Eiichiro Oda, the One Piece manga tells the thrilling story of Monkey D. Luffy, who aspires to be the Pirate King and embarks on a quest to discover a fabled treasure. Throughout his journey, he assembles the Straw Hat Pirates, where each member brings in their special talents and aspirations. Filled with adventure, and the quest for freedom, they navigate a dangerous ocean called the ‘Grand Line’ in pursuit of their dreams.
html:
The release date and time for One Piece Chapter 1139 have finally been announced, and fans are eager to know where to read the manga online. The upcoming chapter promises to propel the thrilling story forward, continuing the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his crew as they pursue the legendary treasure.

So, without wasting any time, let’s dive into all the essential details regarding the release of One Piece Chapter 1139 and how to access it online.

When is the One Piece Chapter 1139 release date and time?

One Piece Chapter 1139 is scheduled to premiere officially on Sunday, February 9, 2025, at 7 AM PT in the U.S.

The latest chapter of the manga is on the way, and there will be no break next week. This ensures that the exciting story continues uninterrupted. With no delays affecting the current chapters, fans can dive into the unfolding saga without interruptions.

To stay updated, check out the release times in local time zones in the U.S. and UK below:

  • 7 AM PT
  • 9 AM CT
  • 10 AM ET

On the other hand, for those in Japan, the chapter will be available a day later, on Monday, February 10, 2025, at 12 AM JST.

Where to read the One Piece Manga with Chapter 1139?

One Piece Chapter 1139 will be available for reading on platforms like Viz Media, Shonen Jump+, and Shueisha’s MANGA Plus.

To read Chapter 1139, a standard subscription to the Shueisha MANGA Plus platform is necessary. This provides access to over 6,000 chapters and is available for only $1.99 per month. For those seeking more content, a premium membership is also offered at $4.99 per month, granting access to over 15,000 chapters. Additionally, new users on the MANGA Plus website can also take advantage of a complimentary first month.

The final three chapters, 1136, 1137, and 1138, will also be accessible to readers at no cost through Viz Media. However, to gain full access to the entire One Piece manga series, a monthly subscription priced at $2.99 is required.

Meanwhile, Shonen Jump+ is a digital manga publication and mobile application managed by Shueisha, providing users with access to a diverse range of manga series, which encompasses both original works and digital adaptations of well-known manga titles.

Created by Eiichiro Oda, the One Piece manga tells the thrilling story of Monkey D. Luffy, who aspires to be the Pirate King and embarks on a quest to discover a fabled treasure. Throughout his journey, he assembles the Straw Hat Pirates, where each member brings in their special talents and aspirations. Filled with adventure, and the quest for freedom, they navigate a dangerous ocean called the ‘Grand Line’ in pursuit of their dreams.
